import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "../../../node_modules/react-router-dom"; class Post extends Component { constructor({ match }) { super(); this.state = { id: match.params.data, postss: [], comments:[], }; } componentDidMount() { const apiUrl = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/" + this.state.id; fetch(apiUrl) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((json) => { this.setState({ postss: json }); }); const cmntUrl = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/comments/"; fetch(cmntUrl) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((json) => { this.setState({ comments: json }); }); } render() { return (
